title: Facial Recognition Model
description: Developed a facial recognition model using pre-trained VGG-16 model with the accuracy of 92% using Python.

title: Text Mining & Document Extraction
description: Created a web-based application for text mining and document extraction using Flask framework.

title: Weather Forecasting System
description: Collected weather data and applied ML algorithms for forecasting; designed UI with Figma.

title: APQueue Mobile Application
description: Developed a mobile app to manage queues in public places, enhancing user experience and reducing wait times.

title: Lung Cancer Severity Analysis
description: Performed data analysis and applied machine learning algorithms to study the severity of lung cancer.

description: Built a web-based alert system with analytics dashboard for health KPI monitoring, fostering collaboration and problem solving.

description: Implemented data structures and algorithms in C++ to manage and optimize disaster relief operations for a real-world simulations.

title: Fraud Detection Dataset Analysis
description: Implemented data structures and algorithms in C++ to group the similar data and search for the specific data with query in the fraud detection dataset by exporting the data into json file.

description: Developed a 2D pixel game using Pygame, implementing game mechanics, graphics, sound effects, and user interactions.

title: Food Ordering System
